name: spotify-fan-website
description: Spotify Fan Website - Browse and explore Spotify playlists with dynamic features. Uses screen-based process isolation for development workflow.

scripts.dev:screen: node bin/validate-workflow.js screen && screen -dmS spotify-dev bash -c 'cd /home/chad/spotify && npm run dev'
scripts.dev:screen:attach: echo '⚠️  WARNING: This will block your terminal!' && sleep 2 && screen -r spotify-dev
scripts.dev:screen:stop: screen -ls | grep spotify-dev | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I {} screen -S {} -X quit 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:screen:status: screen -ls | grep spotify-dev || echo 'No spotify-dev screen session found'
scripts.clean-start: npm run kill-port && npm run dev:screen
scripts.workflow:fix: npm run dev:screen:stop && npm run dev:screen
